Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgGamePiece.GamePiece
      • pkgGamePiece.Item
        • pkgGamePiece.Animal

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Crustacean, Fish

    public abstract class Animal
extends Item
    Inherited by Fish and Crustacean sub classes to be used in G2Model Defines update method, abstract methods, and other setters/getters Created on 11/1/2019
    Author:
    Matthew and Chandler
